"Everybody Hurts" by R.E.M. - This song is a great representation of the ups and downs that life brings, and it's a great reminder to keep going even when things get tough.
"The Middle" by Zedd, Maren Morris, and Grey - This song is about finding the strength to keep going, even when things seem impossible. It's a great reminder to keep pushing forward, no matter what.
"I Will Survive" by Gloria Gaynor - This classic song is all about resilience and determination. It's a great reminder to keep fighting, even when things seem impossible.

"Stronger" by Kelly Clarkson - This song is about finding the strength to overcome adversity and come out even stronger on the other side. It's a great reminder to keep pushing forward, no matter what.
"Roar" by Katy Perry - This song is all about finding the courage to be yourself and to chase your dreams. It's a great reminder to be true to yourself and to never give up on your goals.
